articles.title: Rory McIlroy, motived to win first major in eight years, begins U.S. Open with impressive 3-under 67
articles.description: Rory McIlroy shot an opening-round 3-under 67 at the U.S. Open on Thursday, saying he is not motivated by the threat of the LIV Golf Invitational Series, but by the desire to win his first major in eight years.

articles.title: Chicago Bears players wear Brian Piccolo jerseys at minicamp on anniversary of his death
articles.description: Chicago Bears players wore No. 41 jerseys at their final minicamp practice Thursday to honor Brian Piccolo, who died 52 years ago today from cancer.
articles.content:
LAKE FOREST, Ill. - On the final day of mandatory minicamp, all 90 Chicago Bears players wore No. 41 jerseys at practice to honor Brian Piccolo, who died 52 years ago today from cancer.
